description:
Tired of searching for the right item in an inventory filled with various mods? There's a solution for you.
Simply aim the camera at the required block, and enter the [b]/get[/b] command into the chat to instantly add it to your active hotbar slot.

[h1] FAQ [/h1]
[olist]
    [*]This mod adds the function of obtaining the required block without using the inventory (similar to the middle mouse button in Minecraft).
    [*][b]Why not the middle mouse button? Scrap Mechanic API doesn't support keybindings for mods, but if they add support for them in the future, I'll definitely implement it. [/b]
    [*]Please note that certain items like bearings, pistons, and suspensions cannot be obtained with this command. (because they are joint items)
[/olist]

[h1] Known Issues [/h1]
[olist]
    [*]This mod doesn't work in Survival Mode, but works with Fant Mod.
    [*]This mod doesn't work with additional hotbar slots. I don't know, how to fix this issue.
[/olist]

Please consider leaving a like and adding the mod to your favorites to support my work!
name: Pickable Shapes
